EmailTemplate.name: Commission Control
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!Case.CaseNumber} - Commission Control - Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />
Thank you for submitting the documentation for joining [Select operation BSP OR CASS and insert Country].
Further to verification of documents submitted by your Airline, we kindly ask you to provide us with the following additional documents :
1)
2)
Please submit these documents by attaching them to the reply of this email no later than XX (include the day, month and year). This way, we ensure that all future incoming communications are linked to your on-going process.
The original documentation should be sent within 10 working days from the date of this notification to the following address:
We are looking forward to receiving the missing documentation soon.
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
Global Airline Participation Team
Industry Distribution and Financial Services
International Air Transport Association
33, Route de l'AÃ©roport
1215 Geneva 15 Airport
Switzerland
www.iata.org/customer
